Common Quarto embellishments that can be used for HTML and PDF documents can be found here:

-   [Cross-references](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/cross-references.html)
-   [Callouts](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/callouts.html)
-   [Tabsets](https://quarto.org/docs/interactive/layout.html#tabset-panel)
-   [Citations and Footnotes](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/footnotes-and-citations.html)
-   [Article Layouts](https://quarto.org/docs/authoring/article-layout.html)
-   [General formatting for HTML documents](https://quarto.org/docs/reference/formats/html.html)
-   [General formatting for PDF documents](https://quarto.org/docs/reference/formats/pdf.html)

Using these resources, craft your document into a draft course syllabus using:

-   section headers
-   cross-references
-   callouts
-   columns

[Afterward, add at least two additional embellishments that fit your style!]{style="font-size: 1.25em; color: #e28743"}
